name: Meeting Giant Jelly Fish
description:
Inspired by the 1984 Wes Craven film "A Nightmare on Elm Street", it responds to one of the scenes in the film, when Fred Krueger enters your dream and makes your scariest experience appear real.

I described a composition where a child hides under a blanket while dreaming and an image of a giant jellyfish ready to catch you at any moment.

processed by digital collage technique.
I made this work in early 2020 at the beginning of the pandemic.
